## Función de densidad

$$
f(x)= \left\{
	       \begin{array}{ll}
		 \displaystyle \frac{x^{\alpha-1}e^{-\frac{x}{\beta}}}{\beta^{\alpha}\Gamma(\alpha)}      & \mathrm{si\ } x \geq 0 \\
		 0     & \mathrm{si\ } x < 0  
	       \end{array}
	     \right.
$$


## Función de distribución

$$
 F(x) = \left\{
	       \begin{array}{ll}
		 \displaystyle I(\alpha,\frac{x}{\beta})      & \mathrm{si\ } x \geq 0 \\
		 0     & \mathrm{si\ } x < 0  
	       \end{array}
	     \right.
$$

## Media

$$
E[X]= \beta\alpha
$$

## Varianza

$$
Var[X]= \alpha\beta^2
$$
